question: The "Altos de Chavon", an artificially created Mediterranean style amphitheatre type European village, is located in which country?
explanation: The Altos de Chavon is an artificially created Mediterranean style amphitheatre type European village located in the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region. This village is located atop the Chavon river. It is an important tourist attraction of the Dominican Republic. It has a cultural centre and an archaeological museum.
